document_data.name: Nuth Harandal
document_data.mainbody: '''Nuth Harandal''' was the leader of the [[Storm Rune]], a guild of merchants and landlords in [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Nuth was considered a wily and calculating person.
document_data.Background: Nuth was a poisoner and a merchant who used the Storm Rune to increase his own status and wealth in Eskornar society.
